channel.title: How to be blood (i did it for teh lulz)
channel.description:
Well, let me say this first. i've come to terms with people saying im fake blood over the internet. I honestly don't care anymore. :D well, seeing as im such a good "fake" blood, heres a few "tips" on how to be a fake blood. NOTE:i am not responsible for any outcomes, such as; stabbing, jumping, shooting, raping, gay booty humping etc.[/size]
1. [u][b]The clothes.[/b][/u] Description- Clothes are the bare essentials to show that you "rep" the bloods. The gang colors are:
Red Orange Black Pink (for the "lady bloods")
lets start from the head down.
[u][b]HAT. [/b][/u] you MUST have a type of hat to rep the bloods.
it may be a Boston red sox hat such as... [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/redsox.jpg[/img]
or it may be a NY hat..(must be the red) [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/ny.jpg[/img]
[size="5"]THESE MUST BE FITTED CAPS!!![/size]
next, the head bandanna.
This IS a nessecity.
it may be worn 4 ways.
[u]The Cholo[/u] [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/ilook10.jpg[/img]
[u]The Pirate[/u] [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/pirate.jpg[/img]
[u]The Facial[/u] [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/rawr.jpg[/img]
Wear this under your hat, like so. [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/ohialyx.jpg[/img]
Hair cuts.
Blacks - waves, cornrows or dreads, if its waves, try to get your name, your "set" name, your street name, or a 5 point star.
Mexican - just ask for "the cholo" at the haircut place. they'll know. if you live in a white neighborhood, ask them for a faded 3 and a 2, or a 2 and a 1 with the line. Refer to "the facial" for what it should look like.
White - IF YOU ARE WHITE, DO NOT EVER, EVER, EVER, EVER try to get an afro, cornrows, a "cholo" etc. just get your hair cut short, and dyed blonde. thats your only choice.
[u]Clothes[/u] Shirt - Red southpole or EcKo ltd. minimum blue, more red, the better. get the XXL
Jeans - IMPORTANT- must be southpole, eckos jeans are to tight, look for any with red trim, black. [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/jeans.jpg[/img]
Shoes - Jordan's, red. if you poor, converse. [img]http://www.soledier.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/air-jordan-spizike-fire-red-1.jpg[/img]
BANDANA FOR JEANS - this may be the most important, folded as in picture, ONLY OUT OF RIGHT POCKET, LEFT MEANS YOU ARE FAKE!!!!!!!! [IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm118/figmentscape/jeans.jpg[/img]
And thats the end of clothes. (optional: bandana around wrist, bandana around leg, right side only)
Now you got the clothes over and done with, now you need to speak like a blood.
Few terms you NEED to know.
000 - Blood 001- Blood love 023 - jump him B up - sign of pride for blood- says like "bees up" C down- - said "ceez down" as disrespect to crips SuWoo- Term said to another blood Blat- Same as before, east cost only "you flaggin" meaning "are you a blood" Whats Poppin' - Blood saying hi to another blood. Whats Crackin - a crip term, opposite of Whats Poppin 5s- bloods 6s- crips Crab - worst thing to say to a crip, biggest insult Slob- biggest insult to a blood. [u][b] How to respond to a G-Check[/b][/u]
Chances are, if you go out looking like this, another blood will see you and effectivly "G-Check" you.
Heres how you respond.
(Gang name) (Set) the street or gang number your in (O.G) the gang leader then say "hit a crip in da lip watch his tru colors drip"
now, find other bloods, hang with them, and you got yourself your own bloods set.

item.title: How to be blood (i did it for teh lulz)
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

All bloods/crips outside of : Cali, Texas, New York, and Atlanta are fake, and im pretty sure any gang in England is fake

By fake I presume you mean not a real “bloods gang”, of course you do realise that any group of people can form a gang. There isn’t some unwritten law on what qualifies a real gang and if there was it wouldn’t qualify around some half-wit african americans who think wearing a single colour and a hat in a particular way makes them gang members.

If you’re that stuck up about your gang culture you are one sad piece of shit.

“MY GOD THAT GANG IS NOT FROM NY IT MUST BE FAKE.”
“DUDE YOUR HATS AT THE WRONG FUCKING ANGLE - SWING THAT SHIT 10 DEGREES MOTHER FUCKER”
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 05:47:50 pm[/size][hr]Anyway, I’ve decided promoting gang shit is disallowed.

Read full topic
item.source: How to be blood (i did it for teh lulz)

item.title: How to be blood (i did it for teh lulz)
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:17, topic:237608”][quote author=vato link=topic=313708.msg2496588#msg2496588 date=1224434002]

dont play runescape private servers ha

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285492.0.html

pssst thats like 5+ months old buddy

The above is the entrance exam: Can you spell “blood” with your fingers !?

do you notice its only white people who do that
[/quote]

Nigger fingers must be too fat?

Seriously, why “rep” a street gang, when it will only get you killed or jailed.

It’s pointless shit, the annoying thing is; gang culture is starting to appear in the UK.[/quote]

All bloods/crips outside of : Cali, Texas, New York, and Atlanta are fake, and im pretty sure any gang in England is fake

[quote=“Frell, post:18, topic:237608”][quote author=vato link=topic=313708.msg2496588#msg2496588 date=1224434002]
do you notice its only white people who do that
[/quote]
We do it to make fun of the niggers who think gangs are cool. Its a one way ticket to get killed for no reason.[/quote]
This isnt '92 compton or pasadena

item.title: How to be blood (i did it for teh lulz)
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

Well, let me say this first. i’ve come to terms with people saying im fake blood over the internet. I honestly don’t care anymore.
well, seeing as im such a good “fake” blood, heres a few “tips” on how to be a fake blood.
NOTE:i am not responsible for any outcomes, such as; stabbing, jumping, shooting, raping, gay booty humping etc.[/size]

The clothes.
Description- Clothes are the bare essentials to show that you “rep” the bloods. The gang colors are:

Red
Orange
Black
Pink (for the “lady bloods”)

lets start from the head down.

HAT.
you MUST have a type of hat to rep the bloods.

it may be a Boston red sox hat such as…

or it may be a NY hat…(must be the red)

[size=“5”]THESE MUST BE FITTED CAPS!!![/size]

next, the head bandanna.

This IS a nessecity.

it may be worn 4 ways.

The Cholo

The Pirate

The Facial

Wear this under your hat, like so.

Hair cuts.

Blacks - waves, cornrows or dreads, if its waves, try to get your name, your “set” name, your street name, or a 5 point star.

Mexican - just ask for “the cholo” at the haircut place. they’ll know. if you live in a white neighborhood, ask them for a faded 3 and a 2, or a 2 and a 1 with the line.
Refer to “the facial” for what it should look like.

White - IF YOU ARE WHITE, DO NOT EVER, EVER, EVER, EVER try to get an afro, cornrows, a “cholo” etc. just get your hair cut short, and dyed blonde. thats your only choice.

Clothes
Shirt - Red southpole or EcKo ltd. minimum blue, more red, the better. get the XXL

Jeans - IMPORTANT- must be southpole, eckos jeans are to tight, look for any with red trim, black.

Shoes - Jordan’s, red. if you poor, converse.

BANDANA FOR JEANS - this may be the most important, folded as in picture, ONLY OUT OF RIGHT POCKET, LEFT MEANS YOU ARE FAKE!!!

And thats the end of clothes. (optional: bandana around wrist, bandana around leg, right side only)

Now you got the clothes over and done with, now you need to speak like a blood.

Few terms you NEED to know.

000 - Blood
001- Blood love
023 - jump him
B up - sign of pride for blood- says like “bees up”
C down- - said “ceez down” as disrespect to crips
SuWoo- Term said to another blood
Blat- Same as before, east cost only
“you flaggin” meaning “are you a blood”
Whats Poppin’ - Blood saying hi to another blood.
Whats Crackin - a crip term, opposite of Whats Poppin
5s- bloods
6s- crips
Crab - worst thing to say to a crip, biggest insult
Slob- biggest insult to a blood.

How to respond to a G-Check

Chances are, if you go out looking like this, another blood will see you and effectivly “G-Check” you.

Heres how you respond.

(Gang name)
(Set) the street or gang number your in
(O.G) the gang leader
then say
“hit a crip in da lip watch his tru colors drip”

now, find other bloods, hang with them, and you got yourself your own bloods set.
